execution_quality: Good investigation execution with appropriate use of subagents, but the follow-up shows the user identified a specific technical question the agent hadn't fully addressed (why the astdiff tool missed certain string changes).

summary: The agent successfully investigated what changed in the changelogs using subagents but didn't fully pivot to analyzing the astdiff tool itself as the user's follow-up question implied was the next step. The user's next message shows they wanted deeper analysis of why the diff tool failed, including examination of the current astdiff implementation and whether missed changes were in top-level variables vs. function internals. The work was appropriately scoped and executed with good autonomy, but didn't complete the full investigative arc the user envisioned.
follow_up_pattern: User is pivoting to the next logical phase: examining the astdiff implementation itself to understand the root cause and determine if a lighter-weight fix is viable.
